medium: Rayon, silk, cotton, acrylic paint; machine and hand embroidery
title: Self-portrait
text: Working with the most advanced computerized industrial equipment at an innovative German mill, the artist created a small edition of portrait heads. Later each image was embellished and personalized with additional embroidery.
description: machine embroidery with added hand embroidery, rayon, silk, and cotton threads, acrylic paints
